name: Run Chicken, Run (itch) (RUBYisHERE)
description:
<CONTROLS>

Jump - Space Bar or Left Mouse Button

Down - Arrow Down or Right Mouse Button

<SHORTCUT CONTROLS>

Restart - "r"

Mute Music - "e"

Unmute Music - "w"

<ABOUT>

This is totally not a copy of Chrome Dinosaur. I was just bored and started this project like yesterday.

<MUSIC>

Eric Skiff - A Night Of Dizzy Spells
